title: Cannot show Caller ID outgoing anymore. Phone/Settings/Calls/Additional Settings option is missing.
content:
I was able to hide the number within these settings last week, but now the options are missing. I have deleted cache, uninstalled the updates to the phone app. reinstalled updates. still shows as Restricted or Unknown for outbound calls. Google Pixel XL device.

There was a security update for the Android 10 installed to my device around the same time I was playing with this setting. Not sure if relevant.
